S03bsa032_u:jm_34.14_1: jīvitena nu khinno 'si paraṃ lokaṃ didṛkṣase //
S03bsa032_u:886_0: atha bodhisattvastena tasya rūkṣākṣarakrameṇa pratyākhyānavacasā samupajātavrīḍastatraiva nabhaḥ samutpapāta /
S03bsa032_u:887_0: athānyatamā vanadevatā tasya tamasatkāramasahamānā dhairyaprayāmajijñāsayā vā samutpatya taṃ mahāsattvamuvāca - pakṣivara,
S03bsa032_u:887_2: san saṃvidyamānāyāṃ śaktāvapi marṣayasi? ko 'rthaḥ kṛtaghnenānenaivamupekṣitena?
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.15_0: śaktastvamasya nayane vadanābhighātād visphūrjitaḥ pramathituṃ balaśālino 'pi /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.15_1: daṃṣṭrāntarasthamapi cāmiṣamasya hartuṃ tanmṛṣyate kimayamasya balāvalepaḥ //
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.16_0: atha bodhisattvastathāpyasatkāraviprakṛtaḥ protsāhyamāno 'pi tayā vanadevatayā svāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ pradarśayannuvāca - alamalamanena krameṇa /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.16_1: ārte pravṛttiḥ sādhūnāṃ kṛpayā na tu lipsayā /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.16_2: tāmavaitu paro mā vā tatra kopasya ko vidhiḥ //
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.17_0: vañcanā sā ca tasyaiva yanna vetti kṛtaṃ paraḥ /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.17_1: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati //
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.20_0: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.20_1: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate //
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.21_0: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate 'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā /
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.21_1: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ //
S03bsa032_u:889_0: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca -
S03bsa032_u:jm_34.23_1: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ //
S03bsa032_u:891_0: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno 'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:891_1: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati,
S03bsa032_u:891_3: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:891_4: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
